readable.title: 1527297882_dededc7891
readable.content: a man dressed as Jack Sparrow from Pirates of the Caribbean A man wearing a doo-rag with long hair stares right in the camera . A person with drawn moustache and beard wearing a scarf and beads in his hair . A young man with brown eyes is dressed up like Jack Sparrow . The long haired man is dressed up as a pirate with a red bandanna .
